articles.title: Top science stories of 2021; Insuring nature against extreme storms : Here & Now - NPR
articles.description: This year, scientists learned more about COVID-19 as the virus continued to circulate and mutate. The cicadas emerged from underground, and Perseverance landed on Mars. Laura Helmuth, editor in chief of Scientific American, talks about the year in science. An…

articles.title: Cincinnati’s decorated cornerbacks look to ‘dominate’ Alabama in Cotton Bowl - AL.com

articles.content:
What might be a lopsided Cotton Bowl matchup in some categories will statistically be a meeting of one of the nations best offenses, Alabamas, against one of the best defenses, Cincinnatis.

articles.title: New Covid-19 cases in US soar to record level - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The number of Americans now in hospital with Covid-19 is running at around 60,000, the Centres for Disease Control and Prevention said.
articles.content:
New cases of Covid-19 in the US have soared to the highest level on record at more than 265,000 per day on average, a surge driven largely by the highly contagious Omicron variant.
